body:
fixes #13481
fixes #19553 
fixes #19552 
closes #18893 

Modifications:
- [x] Added archspec to the list of vendored dependencies
- [x] Added support for `apple-clang` flags
- [x] Added support for Graviton and Graviton 2
- [x] Removed every reference to llnl.util.cpu
- [x] Removed tests from Spack code base
title: Make archspec a vendored dependency
